posts.post_content:
Offered here are 3 T206 commons that I received back from PSA (6 Months) along with some other cards.  I did some research and am adjusting the prices
The players are 
Krause Portrait Piedmont 350. Nicely centered. Soft rounded corners no creases SOLD
Tannehill Sweet Caporal 350/30 . Also nicely centered and just has soft corners no creases Sold
McLean Sweet Cap 350/30 also nicely centered with soft corners and no creases 85.00
Please add 3.00 for USPS first class. . If you buy all 3 shipping is free
